channel.title: 2 questions
channel.description:
Ok number 1, please can we try enforcing the rule to post in the right section? i mean for fuck sake have you seen the ammount of people posting moparscape questions in this section when their is a moparscape questions part of these forums (sorry for rude words but its really annoying)
and second i just dont know whats happend, im really confused, when i try to go to www.moparscape.com it wont load (i couldnt figure out how to get on for a week) then i tryed www.moparscape.com/smf and it brang me straight to the forums and loaded fine, any1 know whats happend with my comp, or possibly its a problem with this website? anyways thanks for help.

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

most people i see posting in the wrong sections or people new to the forum.

The best way to stop this from happening, is simply to direct them to the correct forum to post in.

Changing the forum names might also be a thing to do, since ‘Questions’ seems too open a name if you can only post certain questions.

Read full topic
